text: Name is a little misleading as nothing here is about firefly unless the graffiti. Many kids playing basketball. Minus 2 stars due to inaccessible designs. Many knee level walls built in the estate to prevent global access to the park. Only through a small walk way as entrance. As such, I have to jump down the short wall which may break my knees. Imagine elderly. Built in a new estate.

Love this park, and the pleasant and relaxing atmosphere surrounded by beautiful greenery. Some common floral and fauna spotted.
Different floral at different times of the year.
Good place for hanging out. Air is really fresh, it has a basketball court and playground. We had a class party at Firefly park. Kids friendly. Really good place.
Pleasant park with 2 playgrounds, trampolines, a basketball court, 2 fitness corners, small running track and an amphitheater!

There is a large playground in this park, with an elderly exercise area and a basketball court. This is a good place for the residents to exercise and have fun and that this park has facilities for all age group to enjoy. However, there is no toilet in the park so you need to go to the nearby food court for toilet. Overall a good park and I have fun here enjoying the scenery and playing at the basketball court with my friends.
